description: Retrieve a Self Assessment Tax Calculation

summary.title: royaltyPayments
summary.description: Object representing any loyalty payments in the retrieved tax calculation.

royaltyPaymentsAmount.description: The total amount of tax charged on royalty payments. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

rate.description: The rate of the royalty payment. This value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places.

grossRoyaltyPayments.description: The gross royalty payments. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.
